nodes.name: HORUS AXIMAND
nodes.description: The commander-in-chief of the Emperor’s military might and favorite son of the Emperor.

nodes.name: ROGAL DORN
nodes.description: The stoic leader of the Imperial Fists Legion.

nodes.name: SANGUINIUS
nodes.description: The angelic Primarch of the Blood Angels Legion.

nodes.name: EZEKYLE ABADDON
nodes.description: A proud and aggressive senior officer of the Luna Wolves.

nodes.name: TARIK TORGADDON
nodes.description: A joker and man of mighty laughter known for his idiot tricks.

nodes.name: IACTON QRUZE
nodes.description: A veteran known as 'The Half-heard' who is considered solid and venerable.

nodes.name: HASTUR SEJANUS
nodes.description: A noble warrior and diplomat who was the Warmaster's favorite before being murdered.

nodes.name: SERGHAR TARGOST
nodes.description: A captain who also oversees the secret warrior lodges.

nodes.name: GARVIEL LOKEN
nodes.description: A principled and thoughtful captain who retells the story of the false Emperor's fall.

nodes.name: LUC SEDIRAE
nodes.description: A ruthless captain of the Luna Wolves.

nodes.name: TYBALT MARR
nodes.description: Known as 'The Either'.

nodes.name: VERULAM MOY
nodes.description: Known as 'The Or'.

nodes.name: LEV GOSHEN
nodes.description: A senior officer of the Luna Wolves Legion.

nodes.name: KALUS EKADDON
nodes.description: Leads the elite Reaver shock troops.

nodes.name: FALKUS KIBRE
nodes.description: Leader of the elite Justaerin Terminators, known as 'Widowmaker'.

nodes.name: NERO VIPUS
nodes.description: A non-commissioned officer in Loken's company.

nodes.name: XAVYER JUBAL
nodes.description: A squad leader within the Luna Wolves.

nodes.name: MALOGHURST
nodes.description: Nicknamed 'The Twisted'; a close aide and advisor to Horus.

nodes.name: MATHANUAL AUGUST
nodes.description: High-ranking naval officer.

nodes.name: KYRIL SINDERMANN
nodes.description: A high-level speaker and propagandist for the Imperial Truth.

nodes.name: IGNACE KARKASY
nodes.description: A cynical and hard-drinking poet assigned to record the Great Crusade.

nodes.name: MERSADIE OLITON
nodes.description: A documentarist sent to chronicle the deeds of the Legions.

nodes.name: EUPHRATI KEELER
nodes.description: A visual documentarist and photographer.

nodes.name: PEETER EGON MOMUS
nodes.description: An imperial architect.

nodes.name: AENID RATHBONE
nodes.description: A senior official of the Imperial administration.

nodes.name: JEPHTA NAUD
nodes.description: A high-ranking military leader of the non-Imperial interex society.

nodes.name: DIATH SHEHN
nodes.description: An official of the interex.

nodes.name: ASHEROT
nodes.description: An indentured alien servant within the interex.

nodes.name: MITHRAS TULL
nodes.description: A commander in the armies of the interex.

nodes.name: EREBUS
nodes.description: A religious advisor and warrior of the Word Bearers.

nodes.name: SIGISMUND
nodes.description: A legendary champion of the Imperial Fists.

nodes.name: EIDOLON
nodes.description: A high-ranking officer of the III Legion.

nodes.name: LUCIUS
nodes.description: A skilled and arrogant swordsman.

nodes.name: SAUL TARVITZ
nodes.description: A dutiful and honorable captain of the III Legion.

nodes.name: RALDORON
nodes.description: A senior officer second only to Sanguinius.

nodes.name: BOAS COMNENUS
nodes.description: Commander of the warships supporting the Luna Wolves.

nodes.name: HEKTOR VARVARUS
nodes.description: Commander of the non-Astartes military forces.

nodes.name: ING MAE SING
nodes.description: Overseer of telepathic communication for the fleet.

nodes.name: ERFA HINE SWEQ CHOROGUS
nodes.description: A senior member of the Navigator houses.

nodes.name: REGULUS
nodes.description: A representative of the Tech-Priests of Mars.

nodes.name: Koestler
nodes.description: An author of myths and history from the second millennium.

nodes.name: Lorgar
nodes.description: A philosophically minded Primarch known for his views on gods and daemons.

nodes.name: Sahlonum
nodes.description: A philosopher who wrote about the light of science and sorcery.

nodes.name: Dymos
nodes.description: A member of Sejanus's honor guard killed at the false Emperor's palace.

nodes.name: Malsandar
nodes.description: An elite warrior who served under Captain Sejanus.

nodes.name: Gorthoi
nodes.description: A warrior slaughtered by the Invisibles during the failed embassy.
